Use this workflow when preparing salmon datasets for Fisheries Science Advisory Report (FSAR) analysis, review, and publication.

## Step 1 — Define your scope and data classification

- Confirm what dataset(s) and years are in scope for the FSAR.
- Confirm data classification and sharing constraints before publishing.
- Reference policy guidance: [Publishing Data Externally](../reference_info/publishing_data_externally.qmd)

## Step 2 — Map columns to controlled vocabulary terms

1. Open [GC DFO Salmon Ontology documentation](../reference_info/ontology/formal-documentation.qmd).
2. Search for canonical terms for each key variable (e.g., spawner abundance, brood year, CU identifiers).
3. Capture the corresponding canonical URI for each mapped term.

## Step 3 — Build an SDEP package

Use the [SDEP specification](../reference_info/data_standards/salmon-data-exchange-package.qmd).

At minimum, create:

- `dataset.csv`
- `tables.csv`
- `column_dictionary.csv`
- `data/*.csv`
- `codes.csv` (if categorical code lists apply)

Starter assets:

- [Download minimal SDEP example (zip)](../reference_info/data_standards/examples/sdep-minimal-example.zip)
- [Browse template package files](https://github.com/dfo-pacific-science/data-stewardship-unit/tree/main/reference_info/data_standards/examples/sdep-minimal-example)

## Step 4 — Validate before submission/publication

If you are using Meta-SALMON-R locally, validate package structure and semantics before sharing.

Example R workflow:

```r
library(metasalmon)

pkg_path <- "path/to/your/sdep-package"

# Structure checks
validate_dictionary(file.path(pkg_path, "column_dictionary.csv"))

# Semantics checks (as available in your version)
validate_semantics(file.path(pkg_path, "column_dictionary.csv"))
```

## Step 5 — Prepare publication package and provenance

- Ensure source citations, contacts, and license are complete.
- Ensure table descriptions and column descriptions are clear to external users.
- Include a short README describing dataset scope and caveats.

## Step 6 — Publish and cite

- Follow platform guidance and approvals: [Publishing Data Externally](../reference_info/publishing_data_externally.qmd)
- Include version/date metadata and citation details.

## FSAR readiness checklist

- [ ] Vocabulary mappings documented
- [ ] SDEP metadata files completed
- [ ] Validation run locally and issues resolved
- [ ] Data classification + approvals confirmed
- [ ] Publication metadata + citation completed
